DocAttribute.Name: AxisTag
DocAttribute.Documentation: The tag or name for this grid axis.

DocAttribute.Name: AxisCurve
DocAttribute.Documentation: Underlying curve which provides the geometry for this grid axis.

DocAttribute.Name: SameSense
DocAttribute.Documentation: Defines whether the original sense of curve is used or whether it is reversed in the context of the grid axis.

DocAttribute.Name: PartOfW
DocAttribute.Documentation: If provided, the _IfcGridAxis_ is part of the _WAxes_ of _IfcGrid_. > <small> <font color="#FF0000">IFC2x Edition 3 CHANGE  New inverse attribute.</font> </small>

DocAttribute.Name: PartOfV
DocAttribute.Documentation: If provided, the _IfcGridAxis_ is part of the _VAxes_ of _IfcGrid_. > <small> <font color="#FF0000">IFC2x Edition 3 CHANGE  New inverse attribute.</font> </small>

DocAttribute.Name: PartOfU
DocAttribute.Documentation: If provided, the _IfcGridAxis_ is part of the _UAxes_ of _IfcGrid_. > <small> <font color="#FF0000">IFC2x Edition 3 CHANGE  New inverse attribute.</font> </small>

DocAttribute.Name: HasIntersections
DocAttribute.Documentation: The reference to a set of <IfcVirtualGridIntersection's, that connect other grid axes to this grid axis. > <small> <font color="#FF0000">IFC2x3 CHANGE  New inverse attribute.</font> </small>

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The dimensionality of the grid axis is 2.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation:
The _IfcGridAxis_ needs to be used by exactly one of the three attributes of _IfcGrid_: * _UAxes_ * _VAxes_ * _WAxes_
i.e. it can only refer to a single instance of _IfcGrid_ in one of the three list of axes.
